title: Wood and Gold
author: WuTianFang
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuTianFang 于 2011-4-6 07:43 编辑 

Everybody or somebody, let's guess. [gold_ingot][log][log]

Which thing in minecraft is good thing?

A: Wood is good.                                                                           [bedrock]

B: Gold is good.

C: Lapis Lazuli !
